---
title: "Blog"
listing:
  # Base options
  contents: posts
  page-size: 12
  sort: "date desc"
  type: grid
  # Grids
  grid-item-border: true
  grid-item-align: center
  # Advanced options
  categories: true
  max-description-length: 125
  # Feeds
  feed: 
    categories: spatial
  # Listing fields
  fields: [image, description, date, title, reading-time, categories]
  
page-layout: article
title-block-banner: false
# Layout
grid: 
  content-mode: standard
  sidebar-width: 100px
  body-width: 1000px
  margin-width: 200px
  gutter-width: 4rem
---

Hei! Welcome to my blog. Here, I share content about different topics. You can use the right sidebar to filter the content by category. Enjoy!
